mapper.select: select a.book_id, b.spot_name, a.booker, c.name, a.howmany, a.m_qty, a.total, a.vdate, d.time_name, a.msg from booking a, spot b, member c, vtime d where a.spot_code = b.spot_code and a.booker = c.userid and a.vtime = d.time_code order by a.vdate desc, d.time_name desc, a.spot_code limit #{startList},#{listSize}
select count(*) as listCnt from booking
